Angela Merkel

Merkel
Traitor/Pawn

Angela Merkel is a German politician serving as Chancellor of Germany since 2005 and leader of the centre-right Christian Democratic Union since 2000.  Angela is a puppet groomed to be the leader of Germany and her bloodline can be traced back to Adolf Hitler.
